archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
Logging System
• Purpose: Comprehensive log collection, storage, and analysis • Sources: Applications, systems, network devices, security tools • Processing: Log parsing, normalization, enrichment, correlation • Storage: Time-series databases, search engines, data lakes • Analysis: Search and query capabilities, alerting, visualization, reporting • Retention: Compliance requirements, storage optimization, archival policies • Benefits: Troubleshooting, security monitoring, compliance, operational insights
